markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Once the most beautiful of the streets in Ukaizo, giving a full view of the city in all of its gilded glory, the Promenade is now abandoned and desolate - but weathered the storms surprisingly well.

## Points of interest

* The Promenade is a transition point - and one that allows you to have one final chat with your companions before confronting Eothas.

'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Once the most beautiful of the streets in Ukaizo, giving a full view of the city in all of its gilded glory, the Promenade is now abandoned and desolate - but weathered the storms surprisingly well.

==Points of interest==
* The Promenade is a transition point - and one that allows you to have one final chat with your companions before confronting Eothas.
